name: Gen- A Short Interactive Point and Click
name_original: Gen- A Short Interactive Point and Click
description:
Gen is a short Interactive point and click adventure. You guide Gen the average citizen on a quest to find his lost potato salad. Meet some quirky people and journey through weird locations in order to find that prized salad of yours.

Gen, although it looks really simple, is a lot better visually when actually playing the game. From the pictures it looks like something in Microsoft Paint, but I assure you it is much more than that.

Gen is also on Gamejolt here: http://gamejolt.com/games/gen-an-interactive-point-and-click/210135
